list.name: Commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Overall pps of IPv6 processed packets

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.in-ipv6-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.out-ipv6-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/0 IPv6 PPS

panels.description: Overall pps of IPv4 processed packets

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value")  AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.in-ipv4-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value")  AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.out-ipv4-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/0 IPv4 PPS

panels.description: Overall pps of IPv6 processed packets

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.in-ipv6-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value")  AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.out-ipv6-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/1 IPv6 PPS

panels.description: Overall pps of IPv4 processed packets

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.in-ipv4-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value")  AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.out-ipv4-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/1 IPv4 PPS

targets.query: SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.in-ipv6-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.out-ipv6-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.in-ipv4-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.0.out-ipv4-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.in-ipv6-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.out-ipv6-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.in-ipv4-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.1.out-ipv4-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.($interface).in-([[ip_version]])-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.($interface).out-([[ip_version]])-bytes/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.description: Show pps traffic with various criteria

targets.query: SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.($interface).in-([[ip_version]])-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  derivative(8*"value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).lwaftr.statistics.($interface).out-([[ip_version]])-packets/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: Traffic (pps)

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).snabb.0.breaths/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).snabb.1.breaths/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).snabb.0.rxdrop/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).snabb.0.txdrop/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/0 rxdrops & txdrops  (read from Intel 82599 Register) rate

targets.query: SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate" FROM /($host_regex).snabb.1.rxdrop/ WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT derivative("value") AS "rate"  FROM /($host_regex).snabb.1.txdrop/ WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: xe-0/0/1 rxdrops & txdrops (read from Intel 82599 Register) rate

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).protocols.bgp.summary.peer-count/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).protocols.bgp.summary.down-peer-count/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") AS "all" FROM /($host_regex).inet.0.protocols.BGP.routes/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") AS "active" FROM /($host_regex).inet.0.protocols.BGP.actives/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") AS "all" FROM /($host_regex).inet6.0.protocols.BGP.routes/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") AS "active" FROM /($host_regex).inet6.0.protocols.BGP.actives/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Routes for the IPv4 routing table

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.destinations/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.routes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.actives/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.holddown/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet.0.hidden/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

panels.title: Routes (inet.0)

panels.description: Routes for the IPv6 routing table

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet6.0.destinations/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet6.0.routes/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet6.0.actives/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet6.0.holddown/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).route-table.summary.inet6.0.hidden/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

panels.title: Routes (inet6.0)

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-user/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-background/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-system/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-interrupt/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.cpu-idle/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).chassis.routing-engine.*.memory-buffer-utilization/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

panels.description: Memory Sizes of various vMX RE processes

targets.query: select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.rpd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.cosd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.dfwd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.dcd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.mib2d-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.snmpd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.smid-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)
select mean(value) from /($host_regex).re.memory.smihelperd-SIZE/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval)

panels.title: Processes Memory Size

targets.query: select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-traffic-stats.pfe-input-packets/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-traffic-stats.pfe-output-packets/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.hardware-input-drops/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-control-drops/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-high-drops/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-medium-drops/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-input-low-drops/ where $timeFilter
select derivative(value) AS rate from /($host_regex).pfe-general-stats.aggregated.pfe-local-traffic-stats.software-output-low-drops/ where $timeFilter
